Sentencas: In order to evaluate potential of La1-xCaxCrO3-delta as a material for interconnector of solid oxide fuel cells, reduction expansion was measured by using high temperature X-ray diffraction under various P(O-2).
Titulo: Analysis of the effect of the oxide ion vacancy on the crystal structure of La1-xCaxCrO3-δ by high-temperature X-ray diffraction under various oxygen partial pressures

Sentencas: Obtained reduction expansion increased with increasing temperature and Ca content.
Titulo: Analysis of the effect of the oxide ion vacancy on the crystal structure of La1-xCaxCrO3-δ by high-temperature X-ray diffraction under various oxygen partial pressures

Sentencas: With combination of obtained lattice constants and oxygen nonstoichiometry data, the effect of oxide ion vacancy on crystal lattice and their thermodynamic behavior have been deduced.
Titulo: Analysis of the effect of the oxide ion vacancy on the crystal structure of La1-xCaxCrO3-δ by high-temperature X-ray diffraction under various oxygen partial pressures

Sentencas: It was proposed that expansion behavior by delta of La0.9Ca0.1CrO3-delta can be explained assuming ideal solution model on oxide ion vacancies, however, deviation from ideal solution model was observed in reduction expansion behavior of La0.8Ca0.2CrO3-delta and La0.7Ca0.3CrO3.delta With delta region larger than 0.03 and 0.05, respectively.
Titulo: Analysis of the effect of the oxide ion vacancy on the crystal structure of La1-xCaxCrO3-δ by high-temperature X-ray diffraction under various oxygen partial pressures

Sentencas: It was revealed that the crystal system approached to cubic with increase of delta in the region where the deviation from ideal solution model was observed.
Titulo: Analysis of the effect of the oxide ion vacancy on the crystal structure of La1-xCaxCrO3-δ by high-temperature X-ray diffraction under various oxygen partial pressures
